title: Camouflaged Movement Principles
brief: Move without detection by controlling speed, silhouette, and timing.
steps: Step 1: Move slowly to decrease chance of detection and conserve energy.
Step 2: Avoid going over obstacles - go around them when possible.
Step 3: When climbing over obstacles, keep body level with top to avoid silhouetting.
Step 4: Never silhouette yourself against skyline when crossing hills or ridges.
Step 5: Stop frequently to listen and look around slowly for hostile movement.
Step 6: Stay in deepest part of shadows, avoiding lighter shadow edges.
Step 7: Use background noise (aircraft, wind, rain) to cover movement sounds.
warnings: Fast movement attracts attention - only move quickly when capture is imminent.
When moving, you have difficulty detecting others' movement.
Be aware of casting shadows around buildings or other structures.
Your silhouette can be seen against light sources from the opposite side.
